group_1.textLeft: Hey Kyubey! @Why'd you abandon me the other day!?
First you tell me to go kill the Witch, then you go and disappear! I was so scared!

group_1.textRight: Sorry, a familiar got in my way.
After that I lost track of your magic.

group_1.textLeft: If that's how it is, then nevermind...

group_1.textRight: By the way, I hear that your MC-ing was very popular with everyone.
Because you were separated from me, you were able @to meet other magical girls.
which gave you a chance to build your reputation @as an MC
Maybe that was all thanks to the wish you made.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, maybe...!
Then maybe Kyubey really did grant Meguru's wish without any trickery involved.
Yup!
...Oh right, Meguru’s going to the broadcasting club!
See you later, Kyubey.

group_1.textRight: Given the situation, the dissolution of the @broadcasting club should be solved.

group_1.textLeft: No, now's when it'll be dealt with.
I've been so busy with magical girl activities that I haven't had time to attend club activities.
I'm fully back in action today!
Meguru is in perfect form and boiling over with enthusiasm, to save the broadcasting club,
after the next broadcast, my reputation and @popularity will skyrocket!

group_1.textCenter: Meguru hasn't come in a long time!
From today on, I’ll work my hardest at club @activities...

group_1.textLeft: The club's disbandment... will be decided on at tomorrow's Club Activities' Representative's meeting...
We don't have any new members other than you...
We couldn't figure out a plan to recruit new @members...
Looking back, this was a pretty fun club.

group_1.textCenter: (If the broadcasting club is shut down...)
(Meguru's dream will be far away again!)
Meguru’s dream faces bleak prospects after all, from needing to brave sheer mountain crags to @treacherous, muddy slopes!
The broadcasting club -- her one ticket to glory -- is moments from disbanding! @A mere candle in the wind!!
Is there no way to save it anymore!?
What will player Meguru do now!?

group_1.textLeft: ....Meguru...? What's going on...?
Amazing....!
When did you become this eloquent, Meguru...!?
You sounded just like famous MCs do!

group_1.textCenter: Sorry to interrupt you so suddenly...
Is this the clubroom for the broadcasting club?
